definition.text: The first node we will learn about today is the Dashboard. A Dashboard helps us stay organized.

paragraphs.text: To get us started,  I want you to get a little more comfortable with how the Charting Space is set up.
Take a few minutes and look around this hierarchy.  What do you notice?

Thatâ€™s right! There is one Dashboard set up for Backtesting, one for Live Trading, and a third for Learning Tasks. Dashboards are a convenient way to group charts according to type or any other criteria, for that matter.
